actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the Military Procurement Act of 1970 to prohibit the future transportation, deployment, storage, or disposal of chemical and biological warfare munitions outside the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Military Procurement Act of 1970, the future transportation, deployment, storage, or disposal of chemical and biological warfare munitions outside of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Military Procurement Act of 1970 to prohibit the future transportation, deployment, storage, or disposal of chemical and biological warfare munitions outside the United States.
